setting.location: Personal quarters aboard research station orbiting planet Solaris
setting.weather: Still artificial atmosphere, suddenly feeling oppressive

characters.appearance: Man, early 30s, brown hair, face frozen in complete shock, eyes wide with disbelief
characters.clothing: Station uniform, body rigid with tension
characters.position: Standing motionless in center of room, entire body locked in stunned paralysis
characters.action: Staring in absolute shock, mouth slightly open, all normal movement ceased as brain struggles to process impossibility

characters.appearance: Woman, late 20s, dark hair, exactly as remembered from years past, silent and still
characters.clothing: Simple dress from a different era, completely out of place in futuristic setting
characters.position: Sitting on edge of bed, hands folded, perfectly still
characters.action: Gazing calmly at the man, no movement, no speech, presence defying all rational explanation

scene.mainElements: Small personal quarters transformed into impossible reunion space, normal station furniture contrasting with impossible human presence
scene.details: Bed where impossible figure sits, normal station equipment continuing to function as if nothing extraordinary is happening, lighting unchanged but atmosphere completely altered, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Station wall architecture continuing normally, porthole still showing alien planet, technological environment unchanged despite presence of impossibility
scene.atmosphere: Complete psychological shock, reality fracturing, moment of pure impossibility that shatters all scientific understanding, time seeming suspended

composition.cameraAngle: Medium wide shot capturing both figures and the space between them
composition.focus: Contrast between man's shock and woman's impossible calm presence
composition.depth: Shocked character in foreground, impossible figure on bed in middle ground, normal station background emphasizing surreal contrast
